item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Sturdy strawberries: 2 pack 33 feet 50 led fairy lights with 7.8 inch lights spacing, sufficient length for long distance lighting, just plug in and light up your daily life; impact resistant, shatterproof and break resistant led bulbs can withstand careless dropping; not cracking even stepping on it; a great ... item.content:encoded:
Price: $39.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:17:01 UTC – Details)



Sturdy strawberries: 2 pack 33 feet 50 led fairy lights with 7.8 inch lights spacing, sufficient length for long distance lighting, just plug in and light up your daily life; impact resistant, shatterproof and break resistant led bulbs can withstand careless dropping; not cracking even stepping on it; a great gift for families, friends or relatives
50 sets connectable: Easy to install with a cable tie or cup hook, fix it or place it anywhere necessary; up to 50 strands connectable to maximize your need for larger area lighting and festival decorations, 3.9 inches end cord with key designed female connector for quick access and easy connection
Replacement lights and fuse: 2 spare led bulbs and 2 spare fuses for replacement included, take off the led shade, pull out the damaged led bulb from bulb seat, plug in a new one with proper force and put back the shade; slide out the fuse chamber cover toward two blades and take out the burnt out one, install the new one correctly and close the cover; plug in and try working
Unexpected occasions: It is fabulous for Christmas, home, roof, garden, patio, balcony, porch, hallway, fence, shelf, bistro, pub, cafe, restaurant, shopping center, supermarket, New Year, birthday, gathering, disco ball party, dinner party, evening party, note:The AC plug is not waterproof, it should be protected from rainy day
Notes and reminders: 1. Before replacing bulbs, unplug the lights from AC outlet or switch off the Christmas lights string 2. Keep it away from children, kids or toddlers and store them out of their reach 3. Replace with same type bulb

Encouraged to be played with 3+ players.How To Play: Players rotate drawing a sent (or ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99 - $13.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:13:43 UTC – Details)



The Party (game): This is the 100% offline text message party game where players compete to create the funniest text message thread.
Designed for 17+: This game contains mature content and is designed for ages 17+. Encouraged to be played with 3+ players.
How To Play: Players rotate drawing a sent (or “inbox”) card while the rest of the group competes to play the funniest reply card. Once everyone in the group has played their chosen reply card, the judge decides which combo is the funniest. That person gets a point. The person with the most cards at the end, wins.
What’s Inside: Includes 240 Inbox cards and 300 Reply cards plus instructions
Brought to you by What Do You Meme?: We also make other party games inspired by pop culture. Check out our store for more good stuff.

4.5
Price: $19.99 - $13.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:13:43 UTC – Details)

item.title: Lusso Gear Dog Car Seat Cover for Back Seat, Protects from Scratches, Scuffs, Shedding, Mud, & More, 100% Waterproof, Non-Slip Cover Stays Securely in Place, Fits Your Car, Truck, & SUV (Gray)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Defend Your Back Seat from Man’s Best Friend: Four layers of ultra-durable and waterproof Oxford fabric protects your car against scratches, scuffs, shedding, muddy paws, and puppy accidents!Fits All Cars, Trucks, & SUVs: The Lusso Gear cover fits all back bench seats and is extra-large for maximum coverage. Front and ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $49.95 - $35.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:28:48 UTC – Details)



Defend Your Back Seat from Man’s Best Friend: Four layers of ultra-durable and waterproof Oxford fabric protects your car against scratches, scuffs, shedding, muddy paws, and puppy accidents!
Fits All Cars, Trucks, & SUVs: The Lusso Gear cover fits all back bench seats and is extra-large for maximum coverage. Front and side flaps provide full coverage to protect your entire seat. No more fur and mud on your upholstery!
Won’t Slip, Sag, or Slide: Install and remove your cover in a flash with security anchors and an added security strap. A non-slip backing means your cover and your dog stay put without leaving a stain on leather seats.
Seatbelt and Latch Accessible: The Lusso Gear cover never restricts access to seatbelts or latch points. It’s the perfect protector for two and four-legged passengers! The extra-wide slots make it easy to install baby and child seats.
Satisfaction Guaranteed: Cleanup is quick and easy thanks to a machine-washable cover! Wipe with a damp cloth or toss it in the wash for a deeper clean. If you aren’t satisfied with your purchase, let us know and we’ll work with you until you are.

4.5
Price: $49.95 - $35.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:28:48 UTC – Details)

Warm White Christmas C7 String Lights Set of 100 C7 Bulbs Indoor / Outdoor
Our C7 Christmas Lights create a fun, unique look when decorating for any special occasion. Perfect for weddings, parties, tents, patios, awnings and Christmas decoration. These bulbs will screw into a socket and last for 3000 hours.
Add an inviting glow to your space with the Weather Resistant String of Clear C7 Bulb Lights. These lights are perfect for weddings, birthday parties, and other gatherings. These are ideal for adding a cozy atmosphere, or a charming and festive accent, to a casual evening under the stars.

SPECS
Bulb Count: 100
Bulb Spacing: 12 in.
Diameter of Bulb: 1 in.
Bulb & Socket Type: C7 w/ a C7 / E12 base
Total Length (end to end): 100 ft
UL Listed for Indoor & Outdoor Use.
100 Lights Included: C7 E12 Base Light sockets, 5 watts per bulb
One bulb goes out will not affect other bulbs; built in fuse for safety and the electrical plug contains a spare fuse; UL listed. Perfect for Outside Christmas Garden Patio Yard Cafe Tent Porch Deck Party Backyard Decoration
Long Lasting Life: 5W 120V bulbs last for 3000 hours
100FT Long: 12″ spacing between bulbs, 6″ lead on both ends
For Installation, always mount the string first before screwing in the light bulbs. For replacement bulbs, please search for ASIN#B07W4915SZ.

item.title: PetSafe Multi-Tier Pet Fountain – Large Waterer Great for Cats and Dogs – 2 Heights to Drink From – Great for Senior Pets – 100 Oz Water Capacity – Fresh, Filtered Water
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Two tiers, two times the fun! The Multi-Tier Pet Fountain has an upper and lower bowl for your pet to drink from, keeping them happy and hydrated. Pets love running water and are drawn to it. Pet fountains entice pets to drink more water which keeps them healthy and hydrated. ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $41.99 - $29.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:40:10 UTC – Details)


Two tiers, two times the fun! The Multi-Tier Pet Fountain has an upper and lower bowl for your pet to drink from, keeping them happy and hydrated. Pets love running water and are drawn to it. Pet fountains entice pets to drink more water which keeps them healthy and hydrated. With this fountain, pets can drink from the flowing stream or from the bowl tiers (which is awesome) because your pet needs 1 ounce of water per 1 pound they weigh every day. The water constantly circulates which keeps things fresh and helps to promote good pet hygiene. The levels of this fountain make this great for pets of all sizes since they can drink water at a height that’s comfortable for them. This is especially great for senior pets, so they won’t have to bend down as much to drink from the upper tier. This fountain works hard to make sure your best friend will have fresh water. A carbon filter and fountain pump work together so your pet will always have clean water to drink. We’ve made this fountain easy to clean – simply place the fountain in the top rack of the dishwasher and hand wash the pump separately. Your pet deserves the best. Trust PetSafe to keep your pet healthy, safe and happy.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.5 x 11.94 x 5.94 inches; 2.35 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ PWW00-13708
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 16, 2011
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Radio Systems Corporation
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0056ASTES
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ Vietnam
Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

GREAT FOR SENIOR PETS: The multi-tiered design of the fountain is great for senior or arthritic pets who can’t bend down to drink
ENCOURAGES HYDRATION: Falling water stream entices pets to drink more and helps support kidney health in pets through increased hydration
NO THIRSTY PETS: This fountain incorporates an open-bowl design so if your home loses power, your cat or dog will still have access to water
FRESH, FLOWING WATER: Replaceable carbon filter refreshes water and the foam filter catches pet hair and debris to keep your cat’s water clean
TOP-RACK DISHWASHER SAFE: Pet fountain is easy to keep clean, simply place it in the top rack of your dishwasher (excluding the fountain pump)
U.S.-BASED CUSTOMER CARE: Our pet product experts are here to help you and your pet and are available by phone, email or chat if you have any questions

Read more

Keep Your Pet Healthy and Hydrated

Let the fountain do the work!

Give your furry friend fresh, flowing water with the PetSafe Multi-Tier Pet Fountain. The falling water stream encourages your pet to drink more. The fountain features three places for your pets to drink from as well. Let us help keep your pet healthy and hydrated so you and your pet can live happy together.

A Company You Can Trust

  • Global brand in pet products for nearly 30 years
  • U.S.-based experts available Monday through Saturday
  • We help pets and their people live happy together!

Read more

Healthy Pet Lifestyle

No More Worry

The flowing stream and multiple drinking areas help encourage your pet to drink more, so they get the right amount of water each day to keep them healthy and hydrated.

No More Dirty Water

With the Multi-Tier pet fountain, your pet never has to drink dirty water again. The filters and constant water circulation helps keep the water fresh.

More Happy Moments

By keeping your pet hydrated, you and your pet can enjoy playtime more and live happy together.

Read more





Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
More PetSafe Solutions for You and Your Pet Replacement Activated Carbon Filters catch hair and debris, while the carbon keeps water fresh, making it more appealing to drink. Replacement Premium Activated Carbon Filters catch hair and debris, while the segmented carbon compartments offer even carbon distribution while keeping water fresh. Multi-Tier Pet Fountain Replacement Pump can be used as a replacement or as a back-up pump during pump cleanings. Comes with 3 brushes. Great for cleaning your Multi-Tier Pet Fountain pump. The PetSafe ScoopFree Self-Cleaning Automatic Litter Box stays fresh and clean without the hassle of scooping. Feed your pet from anywhere with the PetSafe Smart Feed. Set your pet’s feeding schedule or give some snacks during the day through the smartphone app-enabled feeder.

3 Easy Steps to Clean the Pump

Take the Pump Apart

Remove & keep the blue face plate by using your finger to pull on the small tab on the side.

Remove the Stator

Remove & keep the blue teardrop shaped stator by pulling up on the small lip.

Remove the Impeller

Use a fingernail to pull out the impeller, which is held in place magnetically & keep it. Clean the pump parts with warm water and soap, then reassemble.

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:25:15 UTC – Details)


The strand features 20 icicles with 100 total LED lights. The 10 long icicles have 6 lights and the 10 short ones have 4. It allows you to vary your eye-catching Christmas lights display to keep you excited and your guests dazzled.
FUNCTION & TIMER: Combination, In Wave, Sequential, Slow-glow, Chasing/flash, Slow fade, Twinkle/flash, Steady on total 8 modes. Build in timer and memory function let the icicle lights automatically turn on and off (6hrs on, 18hrs off) and no need to reset every day.
Christmas Decor Dimension: These static lights are mains operated with a discreet clear cable at a total length of approximately 16 ft, and with 1 ft between each bulb. Long ice cone: 12”, short ice cone: 8”. End-to-end plugs let you connect up to 4 strings together.
Wide Applications: The Christmas icicle lights features a realistic look with durable material. Decor it on your gutters, roof lines, fences, porch railings, garages or trees to create the ideal festive front or back garden.
Ideal Christmas Gift: Turn your home into a winter wonderland with these Christmas dripping icicle Lights. Celebrate the season with an eye-catching holiday display when you decorate with classic clear or festive cool white Christmas lights!

Product Description

Wonderful Gift & Decoration

LED atmosphere speakers blend well with room decors, it’s a great gift for birthday/housewarming

Torch Light Bluetooth Speakers

Bluetooth speakers with lights easily create you a sweet weekend and romantic evening experience.

Multi-Sync Connection

Sync up to 100 flame Bluetooth speakers together to get a more immersive sound experience.

IPX5 Waterproof

This speaker can stand up to splashes, spills, and light rain. Great for use by the pool or beach.

1 Wonderful Gift & Decors 2 LED Flame Light 3 Multi-Sync Connection 4 IPX5 Waterproof

360° Surround & HD Sound

Enjoy stunningly balanced sound with great clarity thanks to its cutting-edge DSP technology. Pair 2 speakers together to enjoy 360° room-filling sound. Pair more speakers together to get a more immersive sound experience for big events and parties.

Long Last Battery Life

Built-in new upgrade lithium-ion rechargeable battery, KUCCHERO outdoor speaker offers music up to 12 hours per charge and lasts over 24 hours as a table lamp, creating natural & realistic flames, which is perfect for outdoor / indoor decoration.

Premium Bluetooth Version 5.0

Boasting the latest, lightning-fast Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity protocol, the speaker pairs with Bluetooth-enabled devices like smart phones and additional KUCCHERO speakers within a range of 80 feet (no barriers), automatically reconnects to the last device used.

3 Lighting Modes

In flickering flame light mode, natural, realistic dancing flames form a lively campfire atmosphere. In candlelight mode, the breathing light creates a romantic atmosphere and helps users fall asleep faster. In full brightness mode, it adds 360° illumination to your space.

Technical Specifications

Audio Output 10W Distortion < 6% Sound Quality DSP Balanced Technology Connection Type Bluetooth 5.0, Aux Input Lights 3 Modes, 3 Levels of brightness Charing Port Type-C Charging Time 2.5 Hours Product Size 4″ Φ x 7″ H / unit Mounting Mode Hook for Hang, Wall-Mount, Stake

4-in-1 Upgraded Outdoor Bluetooth Speakers – This 360° LED atmosphere speaker combines 4 functions in 1: Portable Wireless Speaker, Atmosphere Lamp, LED Night Light, and Decoration Lantern. Cutting-edge DSP technology gives a well-balanced sound with great clarity. Its crystal clear sound and optional light effects easily set the right atmosphere for any occasion. Perfect for bringing premium music, illumination, and ambiance to your home, party, patio, fire pit, backyard, beach, camping trips
Support Multi-point Connections, Loud 360° Surround Sound – The latest technology allows you to sync up to 100 KUCCHERO flame Bluetooth speakers. Pair 2 speakers together to enjoy 360° room-filling sound. Pair more speakers together to get a more immersive sound experience for big events and outdoor parties
Bluetooth Speakers with Light Show – Press the light button to toggle between 3 different lighting modes or turn the light off. In flickering flame light mode, natural, realistic dancing flames form a lively campfire atmosphere. In candlelight mode, the breathing light creates a romantic atmosphere and helps users fall asleep faster. In full brightness mode, it adds 360° illumination to your space. Warm light makes LED flame speakers nice outdoor Christmas decorations and Christmas gifts
IPX5 Water Resistant – This portable outdoor speaker can stand up to splashes, spills, and light rain. Great for use by the pool or beach. Enjoy crisp, loud and clear music via Bluetooth 5.0 or the AUX jack. With the latest Type-C charging port, you can enjoy loud and clear sound and exciting light effects for hours on a single charge
Wonderful Decoration & Gift Ideas: Portable LED atmosphere Bluetooth speakers blend well with modern room decor and are easy to carry around, making them great camping gifts, housewarming gifts, birthday gifts for men and women, teenage girls and boys. 2 hooks, 2 stakes, and 2 wall mounts are included for easy placement

Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $37.95
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:18:58 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Office Comfort

Home Comfort

Bedroom Comfort

Back Pain Relief

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 17.5 x 12 x 6 inches; 1.6 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 5, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ ComfiLife
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09TG8L7NY
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Ultimate Comfort at Your Desk & Gaming Chair – One size doesn’t fit all! ComfiLife Footrests are larger, longer and are adjustable to two height options which will make it easy to stretch your feet to any desired height, roll your ankles when they feel stiff, or easily allow for any micro-movements that are needed while sitting.
100% Premium High Density Memory Foam – ComfiLife foot stool under desk is made from high-quality memory foam which will easily conform to feet of all shapes and sizes. Our memory foam footrest is made from top-tier materials that are guaranteed not to deflate or change shape overtime. Our ergonomic office foot rest under desk makes it easy to provide natural support to your whole body for years to come. Our footrests are more comfortable and supportive than those made from plastic or cheap foam
Versatile– ComfiLife footrests can be used in more ways than one! You can also use our memory-foam footrest underneath your knees for support or flip it over and use it as a rocker for underneath your chair. Since it is made from lightweight foam materials, you can easily take it with you wherever you go. You can bring our footrest on a flight, when traveling to the office, or just if you want to work on your computer on the while watching TV.
Easy to Clean – Don’t stress about cleaning your footrest after prolonged use! Our Teardrop Footrest comes with an easy-to-remove cover that is washing-machine safe. Easily put take the cover off and put back on again. The velour fabric won’t fade or degrade after washes, meaning you can wash it as many times as you want without wear and tear.
Our Customers Love ComfiLife Footrest – “Saved my Feet! Wish this was available all those years I worked in an office at a computer.” “I love how, unlike the plastic rests I’ve had in the past, it isn’t going to “break.” It is also firm enough to support your legs” “Since I have been using this foot rest my hip & leg pain have gone and I feel a lot more comfortable while I sit and work”
Lifetime Satisfaction: ComfiLife is trusted by hundreds of thousands happy customers around the world. Your complete satisfaction is our top priority. If you’re not 100% satisfied, we offer a Lifetime Money Back or Replacement Guarantee with no questions asked

Ultimate Comfort for your Feet!

Our ergonomically designed teardrop shaped footrests are more comfortable and supportive than the plastic footrests. Our memory foam material feels great on bare feet and naturally form to the foot’s curvature. Everyone you know will want one!

Pain Relief for Lower Back, Hips & Joints

Get long term relief from back and hip pain! Focus on improving your posture, your joint and hip health, and overall circulation. Our footrest will help improve blood flow to the lower back and joints, which will eventually lead to less pain and pressure in all areas.

Doubles as a Rocker & Leg Rest

Our Teardrop Memory Foam Footrest is versatile and can be used in many different rooms or situations. For example, you can use our teardrop foam footrest underneath your knees or flip it upside down so the pillow can rock beneath your feet. Take our footrest with you on the go or anytime you have to travel on an airplane or work on the go.

Read more

High Density Premium Memory Foam

Our products are made from the highest quality cushioned memory foam. Our footrest will stay firm and in peak condition for long-time use. This memory foam material will eventually conform to your feet, which effortlessly and lightly supports your hips and joints.

2 Height Options for Ultimate Comfort for Everybody

Simply add or remove 2 inches easily with the detachable bottom to fit the size that best suits you. Our adjustable footrest is designed so that anyone of any size can use it; whether it be a student working on homework, a mom reading a novel on the couch, or the businessperson who works at home.

Easy to remove washable cover

The cover on our Teardrop Footrest comes off easily and is 100% machine-washing safe. Never worry about cleaning the footrest or having the materials degrade over time. Keeping our footrest in peak condition is easier than ever!

Anti-slip Bottom

Our non-slip bottom of the footrest will make sure that wherever you put our foot cushion it won’t easily slip or move around. The rubber footing on the bottom of our footrest will ensure that your it stays exactly where you need it to. Decide whatever position is best for your comfort and you are done!

From the brand

Today, we are faced with an increasingly harsh climate, caused by decades of human activity.

Now, we’re trying to make everything GREENER, but it’s going to take one step at a time, just like a WALKER.

PET WASTE BAG

COMPOST POOP BAG

HANDLE WASTE BAG

COMPOST WASTE BAG

Keep Your Hands Safe:Our poo bags are 100% leak-proof and extra thick,never worry about your hands when you pick the poo up.
Super Value Package:36 rolls and 15 bags per roll,total 540 bags can supply up to 7 months.
About Measures:Bag’s size 13×9 inches (LxW),fits all size of dogs and each roll fits standard-size leash dispensers.
Main Material:Unlike other poo bags, ours are made with corn starch blend which more friendly to environment.
Earth Friendly:We use recycled materials in our packaging and roll cores because details matter.
